scripts.version:patch: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm version patch
scripts.version:minor: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm version minor
scripts.version:major: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm version major
scripts.version:prerelease: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm version prerelease --preid beta
scripts.version:preminor: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm version preminor --preid beta
scripts.version:premajor: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm version premajor --preid beta
scripts.release:patch: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm version patch && bun publish
scripts.release:minor: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm version minor && bun publish
scripts.release:major: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm version major && bun publish
scripts.release:beta: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm version preminor --preid beta && bun publish --tag beta
scripts.release:alpha: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm version preminor --preid alpha && bun publish --tag alpha
scripts.pkg:get: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm pkg get
scripts.pkg:fix: cd packages/astro-gravatar && bun pm pkg fix
scripts.pre-release: bun run build && bun run test && bun run typecheck
scripts.release: bun run pre-release && bun run release:patch
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/node_modules bun.lockb && bun install
